children.name: bigcommerce_id
children.title: Bigcommerce ID
children.tooltip: The product ID of the BigCommerce system

children.name: sku
children.title: SKU
children.tooltip: A unique user-defined product code/stock keeping unit (SKU).

children.name: name
children.title: Name
children.tooltip: A unique product name.

children.name: description
children.title: Description
children.tooltip: The product description, which can include HTML formatting.

children.name: product_type
children.title: Type
children.tooltip: The product type. One of: physical - a physical stock unit, digital - a digital download.

children.name: price
children.title: Price
children.tooltip: The price of the product. The price should include or exclude tax, based on the store settings.

children.name: cost_price
children.title: Cost price
children.tooltip: The cost price of the product. Stored for reference only; it is not used or displayed anywhere on the store.

children.name: retail_price
children.title: Retail price
children.tooltip: The retail cost of the product. If entered, the retail cost price will be shown on the product page.

children.name: sale_price
children.title: Sale price
children.tooltip: If entered, the sale price will be used instead of value in the price field when calculating the product's cost.

children.name: map_price
children.title: Map price
children.tooltip: Minimum Advertised Price

children.name: calculated_price
children.title: Calculated price
children.tooltip: The price of the product as seen on the storefront. It will be equal to the sale_price, if set, and the price if there is not a 'Sale price'.

children.name: tax_class_id
children.title: Tax class ID
children.tooltip: The ID of the tax class applied to the product. (NOTE: Value ignored if automatic tax is enabled.)

children.name: product_tax_code
children.title: Product tax code
children.tooltip: Accepts AvaTax System Tax Codes, which identify products and services that fall into special sales-tax categories. By using these codes, merchants who subscribe to BigCommerce's Avalara Premium integration can calculate sales taxes more accurately. Stores without Avalara Premium will ignore the code when calculating sales tax. Do not pass more than one code. The codes are case-sensitive. For details, please see Avalara's documentation.

children.name: base_variant
children.title: Base variant
children.tooltip: The unique base variant associated with a simple product.

children.name: is_visible
children.title: Is visible
children.tooltip: Flag to determine whether the product should be displayed to customers browsing the store. If true, the product will be displayed. If false, the product will be hidden from view.

children.name: page_title
children.title: Page title
children.tooltip: Custom title for the product page. If not defined, the product name will be used as the meta title.

children.name: sort_order
children.title: Sort order
children.tooltip: Priority to give this product when included in product lists on category pages and in search results. Lower integers will place the product closer to the top of the results.

children.name: layout_file
children.title: Layout file
children.tooltip: The layout template file used to render this product category. This field is writable only for stores with a Blueprint theme applied. For stores with a Stencil theme applied, see Custom Template Associations

children.name: is_featured
children.title: Is featured
children.tooltip: Flag to determine whether the product should be included in the featured products panel when viewing the store.

children.name: meta_keywords
children.title: Meta keywords
children.tooltip: Custom meta keywords for the product page. If not defined, the store's default keywords will be used.

children.name: meta_description
children.title: Meta description
children.tooltip: Custom meta description for the product page. If not defined, the store's default meta description will be used.

children.name: condition
children.title: Condition
children.tooltip: The product condition. Will be shown on the product page if the 'Is condition shown' field's value is true.

children.name: is_condition_shown
children.title: Is condition shown
children.tooltip: Flag used to determine whether the product condition is shown to the customer on the product page.

children.name: is_price_hidden
children.title: Is price hidden
children.tooltip: False by default, indicating that this product's price should be shown on the product page. If set to true, the price is hidden. (NOTE: To successfully set 'Is price hidden' to true, the availability value must be disabled.)

children.name: price_hidden_label
children.title: Price hidden label
children.tooltip: By default, an empty string. If 'Is price hidden' is true, the value of 'Price hidden label' is displayed instead of the price. (NOTE: To successfully set a non-empty string value with 'Is price hidden' set to true, the availability value must be disabled.)

children.name: url
children.title: Url
children.tooltip: Product URL on the storefront.

children.name: is_customized
children.title: Is customized
children.tooltip: Returns true if the URL has been changed from its default state (the auto-assigned URL that BigCommerce provides).

children.name: weight
children.title: Weight
children.tooltip: Weight of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs. This is based on the unit set on the store

children.name: width
children.title: Width
children.tooltip: Width of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs.

children.name: height
children.title: Height
children.tooltip: Height of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs.

children.name: depth
children.title: Depth
children.tooltip: Depth of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs.

children.name: brand
children.title: Brand
children.tooltip: A product can be added to an existing brand during a product

children.name: channels
children.title: Channels
children.tooltip: Optional. You can supply a single , multiple , or leave the field empty.

children.name: related_products
children.title: Related products
children.tooltip: An array of products for the related products.

children.name: inventory_level
children.title: Inventory level
children.tooltip: Current inventory level of the product. Simple inventory tracking must be enabled (See the inventory_tracking field) for this to take any effect.

children.name: inventory_warning_level
children.title: Inventory warning level
children.tooltip: Inventory warning level for the product. When the product's inventory level drops below the warning level, the store owner will be informed. Simple inventory tracking must be enabled (see the inventory_tracking field) for this to take any effect.

children.name: inventory_tracking
children.title: Inventory tracking
children.tooltip: The type of inventory tracking for the product. Values are: none - inventory levels will not be tracked; product - inventory levels will be tracked using the inventory_level and inventory_warning_level fields; variant - inventory levels will be tracked based on variants, which maintain their own warning levels and inventory levels.

children.name: bin_picking_number
children.title: Bin picking number
children.tooltip: The bin picking number for the product.

children.name: fixed_cost_shipping_price
children.title: Fixed cost shipping price
children.tooltip: A fixed shipping cost for the product. If defined, this value will be used during checkout instead of normal shipping-cost calculation.

children.name: is_free_shipping
children.title: Is free shipping
children.tooltip: Flag used to indicate whether the product has free shipping. If true, the shipping cost for the product will be zero.

children.name: availability
children.title: Availability
children.tooltip: Availability of the product. (Corresponds to the product's Purchasability section in the control panel.) Supported values: available - the product is available for purchase; disabled - the product is listed on the storefront, but cannot be purchased; preorder - the product is listed for pre-orders.

children.name: availability_description
children.title: Availability description
children.tooltip: Availability text displayed on the checkout page, under the product title. Tells the customer how long it will normally take to ship this product, such as: 'Usually ships in 24 hours.'

children.name: gtin
children.title: GTIN
children.tooltip: Global Trade Item Number

children.name: upc
children.title: UPC
children.tooltip: The product UPC code, which is used in feeds for shopping comparison sites and external channel integrations.

children.name: mpn
children.title: MPN
children.tooltip: Manufacturer Part Number

children.name: order_quantity_minimum
children.title: Order quantity min.
children.tooltip: The minimum quantity an order must contain, to be eligible to purchase this product.

children.name: order_quantity_maximum
children.title: Order quantity max.
children.tooltip: The maximum quantity an order can contain when purchasing the product.

children.name: open_graph_type
children.title: Open graph type
children.tooltip: Type of product, defaults to product.

children.name: open_graph_title
children.title: Open graph title
children.tooltip: Title of the product, if not specified the product name will be used instead.

children.name: open_graph_use_product_name
children.title: Open graph use product name
children.tooltip: Flag to determine if product name or open graph name is used.

children.name: open_graph_description
children.title: Open graph description
children.tooltip: Description to use for the product, if not specified then the meta_description will be used instead.

children.name: open_graph_use_meta_description
children.title: Open graph use meta description
children.tooltip: Flag to determine if product description or open graph description is used.

children.name: open_graph_use_image
children.title: Open graph use image
children.tooltip: Flag to determine if product image or open graph image is used.

children.name: preorder_message
children.title: Preorder message
children.tooltip: Custom expected-date message to display on the product page. If undefined, the message defaults to the storewide setting. Can contain the %%DATE%% placeholder, which will be substituted for the release date.

children.name: is_preorder_only
children.title: Is preorder only
children.tooltip: If set to true then on the preorder release date the preorder status will automatically be removed. If set to false, then on the release date the preorder status will not be removed. It will need to be changed manually either in the control panel or using the API. Using the API set availability to available.

children.name: preorder_release_date
children.title: Preorder release date
children.tooltip: Pre-order release date. See the availability field for details on setting a product's availability to accept pre-orders.

children.name: warranty
children.title: Warranty
children.tooltip: Warranty information displayed on the product page. Can include HTML formatting.

children.name: reviews_rating_sum
children.title: Reviews rating sum
children.tooltip: The total (cumulative) rating for the product.

children.name: reviews_count
children.title: Reviews count
children.tooltip: The number of times the product has been rated.

children.name: total_sold
children.title: Total sold
children.tooltip: The total quantity of this product sold.

children.name: view_count
children.title: View count
children.tooltip: The number of times the product has been viewed.

children.name: date_created
children.title: Date created
children.tooltip: The date on which the product was created.

children.name: date_modified
children.title: Date modified
children.tooltip: The date on which the product was modified.
